ing: 8 fluid ounces marshmallow-flavored vodka (such as SmirnoffÂ®)
4 fluid ounces pumpkin pie liqueur (such as Fulton's HarvestÂ®)
n: Trick or Treat Cocktail or Thankstini
des: "Creamy, frothy fall cocktail with marshmallow vodka and pumpkin liqueur. Easy as turning on a blender and so perfect when the leaves start to fall. Garnish with cinnamon or nutmeg."
ins: Blend vodka, pumpkin liqueur, ice, heavy whipping cream, and simple syrup together in a blender until creamy and fluffy. Pour into martini glasses and garnish with a pinch of cinnamon.
